Not just that, we have a crumbling infrastructure, and Democrats don't care. We are taxed through the nose in California, but our money doesn't go to fixing the state. It goes to the big cities only. So the entire state pays for LA, Sacramento, and San Francisco to look better, while the rest of the state suffers. 

Ever heard of Porterville? They have been out of water longer than Flint Michigan, but nobody knows about it because California isn't a republican state. If Schwarzenegger was governor, you wouldn't be able to avoid knowing about it. But since "moon beam" is governor, you don't know shit about it. People have been driving to ponds and taking the water back home to boil for years. 

I am leaving California for these exact reasons. When we were in a drought, rich neighborhoods always had green lawns. Meanwhile the poor are ticketed and must let their yards die. Poor cities like Fresno met or exceeded expectations, while rich cities like Clovis didn't save water at all. 

That is California. The rich get whatever they want at the expense of the poor. 

Don't believe me still? Look at how water is treated. Fresno has 4 major lakes, but 90% of the water goes to San Francisco, Sacramento, and all the way to LA. The rich took the water from the poor, because they think they deserve it more. Only the poor need to conserve. That way the rich way of life is preserved. 

Fuck California.
